column4: ﻿Hey guys, got a slight problem.  I just upgraded to 8.04 and every time I put my laptop into hibernate the screen resolution switches away from 1280x800 to 1024x768.  Anyone know what's up and a solution?
﻿I'm using an acer Aspire 5633WLMi laptop for reference
check in xorg.conf,  remove all other resolutions listed,  see what that does
I don'T mean remove , I mean comment them out
